name: "Flower-Feather Clan"
title: "Flower-Feather Clan"
desc: A tribe of Qucusaur Riders — swift and aloof — who venerate the Wayob who dictate the flow of heat and scorching winds...\nEvery day, members of the tribe fly with the Qucusaurs, patrolling their territory from the air.

skills.desc: After you Discard 2 cards: Your next off-field character gains 1 stack of "The next time this character switches to become your active character, recover 1 Elemental Die of the corresponding color." (Can stack. Triggers 1 stack each time.)
